translations: 小配件；小工具（gadget 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Personally, I do not believe in any of these slimming gadgets.
sentences.translation: 就我个人而言，我不相信这些减肥的小玩意。

sentences.sentence: His key insight was that headphones weren't gadgets; they were a fashion accessory.
sentences.translation: 他的关键见解在于耳机不是个小玩意，而是一种时尚配饰。

sentences.sentence: Many of the coolest gadgets this year are the same as the coolest gadgets last year—or the year before, even.
sentences.translation: 今年许多最酷的小玩意和去年的一样，甚至和前年的一样。
